author: Special Correspondent
text:
The unaccounted cash which was seized from a contractor in Erode on Wednesday. —PHOTO: M. GOVARTHAN

A flying squad in Modakurichi Assembly segment intercepted a car and seized Rs. 7 lakh unaccounted cash from a building contractor at Ezhumathur on Wednesday.

The contractor S. Paneerselvam was reportedly proceeding towards Nagercoil with the money for the purpose of undertaking construction work contracted by Public Works Department. However, he could not produce the requisite documents to the flying squad leader P. Palanisamy, Assistant Engineer, Agricultural Engineering Department, who raided the vehicle with support from a police team led by Special Sub-Inspector Govindaraj.

The squad handed over the amount to P. Suresh, Assistant Commissioner - Excise, the Returning Officer for Modakurichi Segment, who, in turn, transferred the money to the Treasury Department.

The contractor could claim his money from the Treasury after producing the work order documents, official sources said.
title: Rs. 7 lakh unaccounted cash seized from building contractor
